description:
Everything is bad, but Koji and the crew won`t go down without a fight! Mazinger Z aids Zeus in a desperate fight against Hades, and the Kurogane Five carve a path to the Kedora. But will Baron Ashura betray the past, or the present?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Disappearance! The last Day of the Mikene!
消滅! ミケーネの最後日!
